entries.name: Frog

traits.name: Leap
traits.effect: Can jump away from danger once per encounter.

traits.name: Slippery Hide
traits.effect: First melee hit each round against them is reduced by 1.

entries.description: Small but numerous amphibians found in ponds and wetlands across Azeroth. Though rarely dangerous, they are a staple part of local ecosystems.

entries.name: Toad

traits.name: Warty Skin
traits.effect: On contact, attackers risk becoming Irritated (minor morale penalty).

traits.name: Hop
traits.effect: Can move unpredictably to evade one attack per round.

entries.description: Large swamp-dwelling amphibians that croak ominously in the night. While harmless alone, some have grown into oversized and aggressive forms in fel- or void-tainted regions.

entries.name: Crawg

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.effect: Gains advantage after damaging a bleeding target.

traits.name: Leech Bite
traits.effect: Heals self for 1 HP when striking successfully.

entries.description: Massive amphibian predators from Nazmir’s swamps. Revered and feared by the Blood Trolls, crawgs thrive on carrion and corrupted blood magic.

entries.name: Arachnathid

traits.name: Web Snare
traits.effect: Immobilizes a target briefly.

traits.name: Carapace
traits.effect: Reduces incoming physical damage slightly.

entries.description: Alien spider-beasts of Silithus and Ahn’Qiraj, often serving Qiraji masters. Larger, more armored than common spiders.

entries.name: Blood Tick

traits.name: Leech Bite
traits.effect: Heals itself for 1 HP when it deals damage.

traits.name: Swarm Instinct
traits.effect: Gains morale when near other ticks.

entries.description: Blood-drinking arachnids found in Nazmir during the Blood Troll infestations, known for carrying disease.

entries.name: Scorpid

traits.name: Venom Sting
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned (-1 HP for 2 turns).

traits.name: Chitinous Hide
traits.effect: Reduces damage by 1 from non-magical attacks.

entries.description: Savage desert-dwelling scorpions. Their venom is a staple of apothecaries and assassins alike.

entries.name: Amber Scorpid

traits.name: Amber Sting
traits.effect: Poisons target and reduces their armor briefly.

traits.name: Resilient Carapace
traits.effect: Takes reduced elemental damage.

entries.description: Strange scorpids from Pandaria infused with amber, harder to kill than ordinary desert scorpids.

entries.name: Arcane Scorpid

traits.name: Arcane Surge
traits.effect: Deals arcane backlash damage on first hit received each round.

traits.name: Magic Resilience
traits.effect: Reduces incoming spell damage slightly.

entries.description: Scorpids infused with arcane energies, often found near leyline nexuses.

entries.name: Sea Scorpion

traits.name: Drowning Sting
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned and Slowed briefly.

traits.name: Aquatic Adaptation
traits.effect: Takes no penalties fighting underwater.

entries.description: Massive ocean-dwelling scorpions that dwell in reefs and kelp forests.

entries.name: Spider

traits.name: Web Spin
traits.effect: Immobilizes target for 1 turn.

traits.name: Venom Fang
traits.effect: Inflicts minor Poisoned debuff.

entries.description: Common spiders found throughout Azeroth’s forests and caves.

entries.name: Bone Spider

traits.name: Necrotic Venom
traits.effect: Poison reduces healing received for 2 turns.

traits.name: Skeletal Carapace
traits.effect: Resists physical attacks.

entries.description: Undead arachnids found in Scourge territories, their bodies reanimated husks covered in bone.

entries.name: Crystal Spider

traits.name: Glittering Carapace
traits.effect: Reflects minor spell damage.

traits.name: Frost Bite
traits.effect: Chills target for 1 turn.

entries.description: Glittering spiders from cold caverns, infused with crystalline growths.

entries.name: Lava Spider

traits.name: Burning Web
traits.effect: Immobilizes and inflicts Burning for 1 turn.

traits.name: Heat Resistance
traits.effect: Reduces fire damage taken.

entries.description: Molten spiders dwelling in volcanic regions such as Blackrock Mountain.

entries.name: Tarantula

traits.name: Ambush Pounce
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage when striking from concealment.

traits.name: Thick Hair
traits.effect: Slightly reduces poison and frost damage.

entries.description: Hairy spiders of deserts and grasslands, known for venomous ambush attacks.

entries.name: Venom Spider

traits.name: Deadly Venom
traits.effect: Applies stronger Poisoned debuff.

traits.name: Hardened Carapace
traits.effect: Reduces first hit damage each round.

entries.description: A larger and deadlier strain of spider, their venom can incapacitate prey quickly.

entries.name: Crab

traits.name: Pincer Clamp
traits.effect: Immobilizes target briefly.

traits.name: Hardened Shell
traits.effect: First melee hit each round reduced by 1.

entries.description: Hard-shelled shoreline crustaceans. Though small in number, larger crabs can pose a serious hazard to fishermen and travelers.

entries.name: Hermit Crab

traits.name: Shell Hide
traits.effect: Reduces ranged damage taken by 1.

traits.name: Skitter Retreat
traits.effect: May disengage safely once per encounter.

entries.description: Smaller crustaceans found along beaches and reefs, often hiding in shells and discarded armor pieces.

entries.name: Spider Crab

traits.name: Long Claws
traits.effect: May strike from partial cover without penalty.

traits.name: Armored Carapace
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2 this round.

entries.description: Large deepwater crabs with long legs, infamous in Kul Tiran waters and Nazmir swamps.

entries.name: Crawdad

traits.name: Pinch
traits.effect: On high roll, inflicts Off-Balance to target.

traits.name: Burrow in Mud
traits.effect: Can evade one attack by hiding in terrain.

entries.description: Oversized freshwater crustaceans often found in Outland’s lakes and rivers. Some species have grown large enough to threaten boats.

entries.name: Trilobite

traits.name: Ancient Resilience
traits.effect: Reduces damage from elemental sources.

traits.name: Rolling Escape
traits.effect: May curl up to avoid an attack once per encounter.

entries.description: Relic species from Azeroth’s ancient past, resembling armored, many-legged insects of the sea. Found in fossil-rich zones and Titan vaults.

entries.name: Beetle

traits.name: Chitinous Shell
traits.effect: Reduces first hit damage each round by 1.

traits.name: Burrow
traits.effect: Can hide underground briefly to avoid an attack.

entries.description: Common beetles found throughout Azeroth, often in deserts and ruins.

entries.name: Carrion Beetle

traits.name: Rot Aura
traits.effect: Nearby enemies suffer -1 morale due to stench.

traits.name: Gnaw
traits.effect: Deals extra damage to already wounded targets.

entries.description: Filth-eating beetles that gather around corpses in swarms.

entries.name: Caterpillar

traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.effect: Inflicts minor armor reduction on target.

traits.name: Crawl
traits.effect: Ignores rough terrain penalties.

entries.description: Slow-moving larvae found in forests and magical groves. Sometimes grow into oversized moths or worms.

entries.name: Moth

traits.name: Dust Scales
traits.effect: On hit, target is briefly Blinded.

traits.name: Flutter
traits.effect: Can avoid one ranged attack each round.

entries.description: Graceful fliers native to Pandaria and magical groves. Revered by the night elves and Pandaren alike.

entries.name: Wasp

traits.name: Sting
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned (-1 HP for 2 turns).

traits.name: Swarm Instinct
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage when attacking with another wasp.

entries.description: Aggressive swarmers found in jungles, swamps, and deserts. Larger colonies grow into silithid-like broods.

entries.name: Krolusk

traits.name: Chitin Guard
traits.effect: Reduces all incoming damage by 2 for one round.

traits.name: Sand Burst
traits.effect: Blinds nearby foes with a spray of sand.

entries.description: Massive beetle-like creatures of Vol’dun, used as mounts and war-beasts by the Sethrak.

entries.name: Kunchong

traits.name: Crushing Charge
traits.effect: Knocks targets Off-Balance.

traits.name: Mandible Crush
traits.effect: On hit, target is briefly immobilized.

entries.description: Towering insectoid beasts bred by the Mantid as living war engines in Pandaria.

entries.name: Ravager

traits.name: Blade Limbs
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage on a critical roll.

traits.name: Ferocity
traits.effect: Gains advantage when below half HP.

entries.description: Savage insectoids native to Outland, with bladed limbs and hive aggression.

entries.name: Ravager Larva

traits.name: Gnaw
traits.effect: Inflicts Bleeding (1 turn).

traits.name: Skitter
traits.effect: Can move without provoking once per round.

entries.description: Larval stage of the ravager, still dangerous in numbers.

entries.name: Sand Reaver

traits.name: Mandible Slam
traits.effect: On hit, staggers target.

traits.name: Hive Resilience
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2 for two rounds.

entries.description: Giant silithid war-beasts unleashed in Ahn’Qiraj. Towering predators that crush even armored foes.

entries.name: Crow

traits.name: Scavenger’s Cry
traits.effect: Nearby enemies suffer -1 morale briefly.

traits.name: Flock
traits.effect: When in groups, gain advantage on attacks.

entries.description: Dark-feathered scavengers, common across Azeroth.

entries.name: Raven

traits.name: Piercing Call
traits.effect: Saps morale of weaker foes.

traits.name: Keen Eyes
traits.effect: Grants advantage on spotting hidden enemies.

entries.description: Omens of death and storm, ravens are tied to shadow and prophecy.

entries.name: Eagle

traits.name: Talon Strike
traits.effect: Deals extra damage to smaller targets.

traits.name: Soar
traits.effect: Ignores terrain penalties when moving.

entries.description: Majestic predators that hunt across mountains and plains.

entries.name: Hawk

traits.name: Dive
traits.effect: First attack after movement gains advantage.

traits.name: Keen Vision
traits.effect: Spots concealed targets easily.

entries.description: Swift birds of prey, often bonded with hunters.

entries.name: Falcon

traits.name: Falconry Bond
traits.effect: May grant allies +1 on ranged attacks once per encounter.

traits.name: Swift Dive
traits.effect: On hit, forces target Off-Balance.

entries.description: Highly trained hunting birds used by scouts and nobles.

entries.name: Owl

traits.name: Silent Flight
traits.effect: First attack from stealth has advantage.

traits.name: Night Vision
traits.effect: Sees clearly in darkness.

entries.description: Night predators revered by kaldorei for wisdom and stealth.

entries.name: Storm Crow

traits.name: Lightning Call
traits.effect: On hit, also shocks another nearby target.

traits.name: Storm Rider
traits.effect: Immune to weather penalties.

entries.description: Storm-infused crows summoned by druids and shamans.

entries.name: Vulture

traits.name: Feast on Carrion
traits.effect: Heals 1 HP when near a corpse.

traits.name: Circling Fear
traits.effect: Enemies below lose morale while vultures circle.

entries.description: Desert scavengers often circling battlefields.

entries.name: Condor

traits.name: Mighty Wings
traits.effect: Creates wind buffets that hinder ranged attacks.

traits.name: Carcass Feeder
traits.effect: Restores morale to allies after feeding.

entries.description: Enormous scavenger birds, larger than most raptors.

entries.name: Firehawk

traits.name: Flame Wing
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Burning for 1 turn.

traits.name: Molten Form
traits.effect: Takes reduced damage from fire.

entries.description: Fiery birds infused by Ragnaros’ flame, often bound as mounts or guardians.

entries.name: Dread Raven

traits.name: Umbral Cry
traits.effect: Inflicts fear on weaker foes.

traits.name: Shadow Soar
traits.effect: Takes reduced shadow damage.

entries.description: Ravens empowered by void or shadow, common in Draenor and the Shadowlands.

entries.name: Roc

traits.name: Crushing Talons
traits.effect: Can grapple and restrain medium foes.

traits.name: Sky Terror
traits.effect: Nearby enemies suffer morale loss.

entries.description: Enormous mythical raptors known across deserts and high peaks.

entries.name: Penguin

traits.name: Slide
traits.effect: Can move quickly on ice.

traits.name: Schooling
traits.effect: Gains advantage when near other penguins.

entries.description: Flightless birds of Northrend and southern seas, harmless but comical.

entries.name: Seagull

traits.name: Dive Bomb
traits.effect: Steals small items or food.

traits.name: Irritating Cry
traits.effect: Can distract enemies for one turn.

entries.description: Common scavenger birds of coasts and harbors.

entries.name: Gryphon

traits.name: Sky Dive
traits.effect: On hit from above, knocks target Off-Balance.

traits.name: Wing Buffet
traits.effect: Pushes enemies back briefly.

entries.description: Majestic winged beasts of dwarven and Alliance armies, serving as mounts and guardians of Aerie Peak and Stormwind.

entries.name: Hippogryph

traits.name: Moon-Blessed
traits.effect: Takes reduced damage at night.

traits.name: Raking Claws
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Bleeding (1–2 turns).

entries.description: Sacred steeds of the kaldorei, bonded to druids and priestesses of Elune.

entries.name: Wyvern

traits.name: Stinger Tail
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned (-1 HP for 2 turns).

traits.name: Battle Roar
traits.effect: Nearby allies gain +1 morale.

entries.description: Fierce Horde aerial mounts, native to Kalimdor’s peaks and deserts, known for their loyalty to orcish riders.

entries.name: Owlcat

traits.name: Silent Pounce
traits.effect: First attack from stealth has advantage.

traits.name: Nocturnal Watch
traits.effect: Allies nearby resist morale loss at night.

entries.description: Mysterious hybrids from Val’sharah, blending the traits of owls and cats, favored by druids of the claw.

entries.name: Wolfhawk

traits.name: Predatory Bond
traits.effect: Allies gain +1 to morale when this beast scores a kill.

traits.name: Piercing Screech
traits.effect: Enemies within earshot suffer disadvantage next action.

entries.description: Feral yet majestic hybrids of wolves and hawks, bred as companions for hunters during the Legion invasion.

entries.name: Larion

traits.name: Bastion Bond
traits.effect: Nearby Kyrian allies gain morale each turn.

traits.name: Radiant Soar
traits.effect: On critical, inflicts Blind to enemies struck.

entries.description: Radiant lion-birds of Bastion, companions of the Kyrian who embody duty and valor.

entries.name: Cloudstrider

traits.name: Heavenly Wings
traits.effect: Can hover, ignoring terrain obstacles for 1 round.

traits.name: Beacon Cry
traits.effect: Heals allies’ morale when it calls.

entries.description: Celestial feathermanes dwelling in the highest reaches of the Shadowlands’ skies.

entries.name: Carp

traits.name: Schooling
traits.effect: When in groups, harder to hit.

traits.name: Quick Swim
traits.effect: Can evade one attack per round with advantage.

entries.description: Common river fish across Pandaria and other regions. Harmless unless swarming in massive numbers.

entries.name: Eel

traits.name: Electric Jolt
traits.effect: On hit, target loses morale briefly.

traits.name: Slither
traits.effect: Can move through narrow gaps freely.

entries.description: Long-bodied predators that haunt oceans and rivers, striking with lightning-fast attacks.

entries.name: Frenzy

traits.name: Blood Scent
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage to bleeding foes.

traits.name: Swarm Attack
traits.effect: Multiple Frenzies attacking same target gain advantage.

entries.description: Piranha-like predators of Azeroth’s seas, capable of devouring prey in moments.

entries.name: Grouper

traits.name: Ambush Bite
traits.effect: Deals extra damage when attacking from concealment.

traits.name: Deep Dive
traits.effect: Can escape into deeper water once per encounter.

entries.description: Large reef fish that can swallow smaller prey whole.

entries.name: Puffer Fish

traits.name: Inflate
traits.effect: Becomes harder to hit for 1 round.

traits.name: Toxic Spines
traits.effect: On melee hit, attacker is Poisoned for 1 turn.

entries.description: Small but dangerous fish capable of poisoning predators with its spines.

entries.name: Shark

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage if target is wounded.

traits.name: Swift Swim
traits.effect: Can move farther each round underwater.

entries.description: Common apex predators of Azeroth’s oceans. Multiple species exist, from reef sharks to deepwater hunters.

entries.name: Whale Shark

traits.name: Massive Bulk
traits.effect: Immune to forced movement.

traits.name: Ocean Roam
traits.effect: Can move vast distances between zones.

entries.description: Gigantic and ancient sea behemoths, revered as living relics of the deep seas.

entries.name: Kraken

traits.name: Tentacle Slam
traits.effect: Can strike multiple targets at once.

traits.name: Drag to the Deep
traits.effect: Pulls prey underwater to drown them.

entries.description: Mythical leviathans that dwell in Azeroth’s oceans. Their enormous tentacles can sink entire ships.

entries.name: Ray

traits.name: Glide
traits.effect: Can move silently underwater without detection.

traits.name: Tail Whip
traits.effect: On hit, target is briefly Staggered.

entries.description: Graceful sea rays, including the Fathom Rays of Kul Tiras and Nazjatar.

entries.name: Seahorse

traits.name: Agile Swim
traits.effect: Can turn sharply underwater.

traits.name: Bubble Jet
traits.effect: Can disorient attackers once per encounter.

entries.description: Magical seahorses from Vashj’ir, used as mounts by adventurers during the Cataclysm.

entries.name: Tidestallion

traits.name: Wave Rider
traits.effect: Can traverse surface and underwater seamlessly.

traits.name: Tidal Aura
traits.effect: Allies nearby gain advantage on water terrain checks.

entries.description: Majestic steeds of Kul Tiras, shaped by ocean tides and druidic magic.

entries.name: Orca

traits.name: Pod Coordination
traits.effect: Gains advantage when fighting with other orcas.

traits.name: Crushing Bite
traits.effect: Deals heavy damage on a critical roll.

entries.description: Killer whales that hunt in pods, often revered by seafaring cultures.

entries.name: Armadillo

traits.name: Roll Up
traits.effect: Can curl into a ball, reducing incoming damage by 2 this round.

traits.name: Burrow
traits.effect: Can dig through soft terrain to evade once per encounter.

entries.description: Tough-shelled mammals from deserts and savannas. Rarely aggressive unless provoked.

entries.name: Bat

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.effect: Can detect concealed enemies.

traits.name: Screech
traits.effect: Inflicts Disoriented on nearby foes for 1 turn.

entries.description: Cave-dwelling mammals that swarm in flocks. Often tamed as aerial scouts by the Forsaken.

entries.name: Vampire Bat

traits.name: Blood Drain
traits.effect: Heals for 1 HP when striking a living foe.

traits.name: Nocturnal Predator
traits.effect: Advantage on first attack each night.

entries.description: Blood-feeding bats from dark jungles and caves, often associated with troll witch doctors.

entries.name: Bear

traits.name: Maul
traits.effect: On hit, may knock target Prone.

traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.effect: Reduces incoming physical damage by 1.

entries.description: Powerful omnivores of Azeroth’s forests and tundras. Variants include polar bears, bramblebears, and corrupted felbears.

entries.name: Porcupine

traits.name: Quill Burst
traits.effect: On hit, melee attackers are Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Forager
traits.effect: Can sniff out edible plants, restoring morale to allies.

entries.description: Small, spiny mammals of Pandaria and beyond. Their quills make them dangerous for predators.

entries.name: Wolf

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.effect: Gains advantage when adjacent to an ally wolf.

traits.name: Howl
traits.effect: Allies within earshot gain +1 morale.

entries.description: Common predators of Azeroth, loyal to hunters and feared in packs.

entries.name: Dire Wolf

traits.name: Savage Bite
traits.effect: On critical, inflicts Bleeding for 2 turns.

traits.name: Alpha Roar
traits.effect: Nearby wolves gain +1 to next attack roll.

entries.description: Massive wolves roaming Northrend, Draenor, and ancient forests, often used as mounts by orcs.

entries.name: Frostwolf

traits.name: Frostfur
traits.effect: Reduces incoming frost damage by 2.

traits.name: Loyal Bond
traits.effect: When near Frostwolf orc allies, morale increases.

entries.description: Companions of the Frostwolf Clan, adapted to snowy peaks and tundras.

entries.name: Worg

traits.name: Ambush
traits.effect: First attack from concealment has advantage.

traits.name: Savage Maw
traits.effect: Critical hits inflict morale damage.

entries.description: Larger, more cunning wolves dwelling in Northrend and the Eastern Kingdoms, often corrupted by dark magic.

entries.name: Void Wolf

traits.name: Umbral Bite
traits.effect: On hit, reduces target morale by 2.

traits.name: Phasing Step
traits.effect: May teleport a short distance once per encounter.

entries.description: Wolves twisted by the void, their howls spread terror across Draenor’s shadows.

entries.name: Fel Wolf

traits.name: Fel Flame
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Burning for 1 turn.

traits.name: Corruption Aura
traits.effect: Allies nearby take 1 damage at the start of their turn.

entries.description: Orcish wolf breeds infused with fel energy during the Legion’s corruption.

entries.name: Garn

traits.name: Savage Howl
traits.effect: All enemies within range must test or lose morale.

traits.name: Fury Claws
traits.effect: Deals +2 damage on critical hits.

entries.description: Gigantic wolf-beasts of Draenor, bred by orcs as living siege weapons.

entries.name: Fox

traits.name: Cunning Step
traits.effect: Once per round, may disengage without penalty.

traits.name: Quick Reflexes
traits.effect: Has advantage against traps.

entries.description: Small but clever canines found in forests and plains.

entries.name: Vulpin

traits.name: Illusory Shift
traits.effect: Can disguise itself briefly in terrain once per encounter.

traits.name: Fey Bond
traits.effect: Nearby allies restore 1 morale each turn.

entries.description: Mystical fox-like creatures of Ardenweald, tied to the Night Fae and anima streams.

entries.name: Darkhound

traits.name: Diseased Bite
traits.effect: Inflicts Weakened (-1 to rolls) for 1 turn.

traits.name: Unholy Resilience
traits.effect: Takes half damage from shadow sources.

entries.description: Undead-corrupted hounds of the Scourge, roaming Lordaeron’s blighted fields.

entries.name: Helhound

traits.name: Hellfire Breath
traits.effect: Breathes flame, inflicting Burning for 2 turns.

traits.name: Infernal Hide
traits.effect: Reduces fire damage taken.

entries.description: Infernal demon-hounds unleashed during the Legion’s invasions.

entries.name: Shadehound

traits.name: Umbral Maw
traits.effect: Inflicts Fear on weaker foes when attacking.

traits.name: Shadowstep
traits.effect: Can teleport 1–2 spaces once per round.

entries.description: Sinister wolf-beasts of the Maw, ridden as mounts by Jailer’s servants.

entries.name: Mastiff

traits.name: Guard Dog
traits.effect: Allies nearby are less likely to be ambushed.

traits.name: Bite and Hold
traits.effect: On hit, target is Immobilized briefly.

entries.description: Large trained war hounds used by nobles, hunters, and city guards.

entries.name: Retriever

traits.name: Fetch
traits.effect: Can retrieve small objects for allies.

traits.name: Obedient
traits.effect: Gains morale when near a trusted handler.

entries.description: Domesticated hounds bred for loyalty and service in Kul Tiras and beyond.

entries.name: Lion

traits.name: Pride Leader
traits.effect: Allied lions gain +1 morale when near this unit.

traits.name: Savage Bite
traits.effect: On critical, inflicts Bleeding for 2 turns.

entries.description: Regal predators of savannas and plains, often associated with human and troll heraldry.

entries.name: Tiger

traits.name: Ambush Pounce
traits.effect: First attack from stealth has advantage.

traits.name: Raking Claws
traits.effect: On hit, reduces target’s defense briefly.

entries.description: Striped jungle and mountain predators, revered by troll and pandaren cultures.

entries.name: Panther

traits.name: Stealth Stalker
traits.effect: Difficult to detect in foliage or shadows.

traits.name: Throat Bite
traits.effect: On critical, silences target for 1 turn.

entries.description: Shadowy cats prowling Stranglethorn and other jungles, sacred to the Gurubashi trolls.

entries.name: Lynx

traits.name: Ear Tufts
traits.effect: Advantage on perception checks.

traits.name: Spring Pounce
traits.effect: May close distance as a free move once per encounter.

entries.description: Smaller wildcats of Quel’Thalas and northern forests, fast and deadly despite their size.

entries.name: Leopard / Snow Leopard

traits.name: Silent Stalk
traits.effect: Harder to detect while moving.

traits.name: Ice Pelt
traits.effect: Snow leopards take reduced frost damage.

entries.description: Spotted hunters of temperate and icy regions, agile climbers and stealthy stalkers.

entries.name: Mountain Lion

traits.name: Ridge Runner
traits.effect: Ignores rough mountain terrain.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.effect: First attack after a leap deals extra damage.

entries.description: Solitary predators of Azeroth’s mountain passes.

entries.name: Cheetah

traits.name: Sprint
traits.effect: Can move twice per turn once per encounter.

traits.name: Fragile Frame
traits.effect: Takes +1 damage from critical hits.

entries.description: Swift runners of open plains, more fragile but faster than other big cats.

entries.name: Jaguar

traits.name: Death Drop
traits.effect: Can leap from elevated terrain for advantage.

traits.name: Bone Crusher
traits.effect: On critical, ignores light armor.

entries.description: Stealthy jungle hunters with crushing jaws, common in troll territories.

entries.name: Dreadsaber

traits.name: Fearful Roar
traits.effect: Nearby enemies must test morale.

traits.name: Fel Pelt
traits.effect: Takes reduced shadow and fel damage.

entries.description: Ferocious, corrupted sabercats infused with fel or shadow energy.

entries.name: Frostsaber

traits.name: Ice Claws
traits.effect: On hit, chills target for 1 turn.

traits.name: Winter Coat
traits.effect: Takes reduced frost damage.

entries.description: Sacred winter sabercats of Winterspring, bonded to kaldorei hunters and druids.

entries.name: Nightsaber

traits.name: Shadowmeld
traits.effect: First attack from concealment has advantage.

traits.name: Silent Prowl
traits.effect: Enemies have disadvantage to detect them at night.

entries.description: Stealthy sabercats of Ashenvale, revered by the kaldorei as companions and mounts.

entries.name: Mana Saber

traits.name: Arcane Pelt
traits.effect: Absorbs 2 arcane damage each round.

traits.name: Blink Strike
traits.effect: Once per encounter, teleports before striking.

entries.description: Arcane-infused sabercats of Suramar and Azeroth, companions to nightborne and kaldorei arcanists.

entries.name: Jeweled Panther

traits.name: Gem Resilience
traits.effect: Takes half damage from elemental sources.

traits.name: Prismatic Strike
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts a random elemental effect.

entries.description: Magical jewelcrafted constructs shaped like panthers, prized as luxury mounts.

entries.name: Clefthoof

traits.name: Gore
traits.effect: Deals heavy damage on a charge.

traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.effect: Reduces physical damage taken by 2.

entries.description: Massive draenor-native bovids resembling both oxen and rhinos. Fierce grazers and mounts for the Mag’har.

entries.name: Talbuk

traits.name: Fleet Hooves
traits.effect: Ignores difficult terrain once per encounter.

traits.name: Horn Jab
traits.effect: Inflicts Off-Balance on hit.

entries.description: Graceful antelope-like creatures of Draenor, domesticated as mounts by draenei and orcs.

entries.name: Yak

traits.name: Sturdy Frame
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 1 each round.

traits.name: Pack Beast
traits.effect: Allies nearby gain morale when resting near a yak.

entries.description: Large, shaggy beasts of Pandaria, valued for carrying goods across mountain passes.

entries.name: Tauralus

traits.name: Bone Plate
traits.effect: Takes half damage from the first hit each round.

traits.name: Charge
traits.effect: On critical, knocks target Prone.

entries.description: Armored beasts of Maldraxxus, bred as war mounts for necrolords.

entries.name: Musken

traits.name: Stampede
traits.effect: Deals damage to all enemies in path.

traits.name: Stubborn
traits.effect: Immune to forced movement.

entries.description: Massive ox-like bovids found in Legion’s Broken Isles, often hunted for hides and horns.

entries.name: Camel

traits.name: Spit
traits.effect: On hit, target is Blinded for 1 turn.

traits.name: Endurance
traits.effect: Ignores exhaustion penalties.

entries.description: Desert-dwelling beasts of burden, key to trade caravans across Uldum.

entries.name: Alpaca

traits.name: Surefooted
traits.effect: Advantage on rough terrain checks.

traits.name: Gentle Aura
traits.effect: Allies nearby restore morale when resting.

entries.description: Domesticated pack beasts found in Vol’dun, adapted to desert survival.

entries.name: Stag

traits.name: Antler Charge
traits.effect: Inflicts Off-Balance when charging.

traits.name: Fleet Step
traits.effect: Can disengage without penalty once per encounter.

entries.description: Graceful deer of Azeroth’s forests, often revered by druids and night elves.

entries.name: Runestag

traits.name: Anima Horns
traits.effect: On hit, target loses morale.

traits.name: Spirit Bond
traits.effect: Nearby allies gain advantage for 1 round.

entries.description: Anima-infused cervids of Ardenweald, embodying the wilds’ eternal cycle.

entries.name: Horse

traits.name: Gallop
traits.effect: May move double distance once per encounter.

traits.name: Steadfast
traits.effect: Resists morale loss when mounted.

entries.description: Domesticated steeds of humans, widely used for transport and war.

entries.name: Zhevra

traits.name: Striped Dash
traits.effect: On hit after moving, deal extra damage.

traits.name: Herd Instinct
traits.effect: Allies nearby gain +1 to morale.

entries.description: Striped equines of the Barrens, fierce and untamable by most except the Horde.

entries.name: Unicorn

traits.name: Healing Horn
traits.effect: Restores 3 HP to an ally once per encounter.

traits.name: Aura of Purity
traits.effect: Allies nearby resist shadow damage.

entries.description: Mythical equines tied to elven and human myths, rare and magical.

entries.name: Elekk

traits.name: Stomp
traits.effect: AoE knockdown against smaller foes.

traits.name: Enduring Beast
traits.effect: Ignores exhaustion penalties.

entries.description: Massive draenei pack beasts resembling elephants, revered in Exodar and Draenor.

entries.name: Boar

traits.name: Charge
traits.effect: Deals extra damage when moving before attack.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.effect: Immune to morale loss when below half HP.

entries.description: Aggressive tusked swine found across Azeroth, especially in Elwynn and Durotar.

entries.name: Helboar

traits.name: Corrupted Blood
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Poisoned for 2 turns.

traits.name: Fel Rage
traits.effect: At half HP, gains +1 attack.

entries.description: Fel-corrupted boars roaming Outland, spreading disease and corruption.

entries.name: Monkey

traits.name: Banana Toss
traits.effect: On hit, target is Distracted (disadvantage) 1 turn.

traits.name: Clamber
traits.effect: Can climb terrain without penalty.

entries.description: Mischievous and thieving primates, often found near troll ruins or pirate coves. Known to harass adventurers with stolen food or trinkets.

entries.name: Gorilla

traits.name: Mighty Slam
traits.effect: On hit, target is Knocked Back.

traits.name: Silverback Roar
traits.effect: Allies nearby gain +1 morale until end of round.

entries.description: Large, powerful primates inhabiting jungles and mountains, revered by trolls and hunters alike.

entries.name: Yeti

traits.name: Frozen Hide
traits.effect: Takes half damage from frost attacks.

traits.name: Crushing Grip
traits.effect: On hit, immobilizes target for 1 turn.

entries.description: Mythic primate-like beasts of Azeroth’s frozen mountains and caves. Yeti are both feared and worshiped as guardians of the wild.

entries.name: Giant Snail

traits.name: Slimy Trail
traits.effect: Enemies moving through its path are Slowed for 1 turn.

traits.name: Shell Defense
traits.effect: First hit each round reduced by 2.

entries.description: Oversized snails found in damp caverns and corrupted forests. Their shells are nearly impenetrable.

entries.name: Sea Snail

traits.name: Coral Armor
traits.effect: Takes half damage from ranged attacks.

traits.name: Acidic Slime
traits.effect: On hit, target loses 1 armor until end of next turn.

entries.description: Marine gastropods inhabiting the reefs of Kul Tiras and Nazjatar. Hardy and venomous.

entries.name: Sea Slug

traits.name: Toxic Ooze
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.effect: Advantage on stealth rolls in coral or algae terrain.

entries.description: Soft-bodied slugs that excrete noxious slime, making them dangerous despite their slow pace.

entries.name: Giant Octopus

traits.name: Ink Cloud
traits.effect: Creates concealment, imposing disadvantage on attacks.

traits.name: Tentacle Grapple
traits.effect: Immobilizes target for 1 turn on hit.

entries.description: Large octopuses of Azeroth’s seas, capable of grappling ships and drowning sailors.

entries.name: Giant Squid

traits.name: Tentacle Slam
traits.effect: On hit, pushes target Off-Balance.

traits.name: Deepwater Predator
traits.effect: Ignores concealment in deep oceans.

entries.description: Enormous squid-like monsters lurking in deep seas, sometimes mistaken for kraken kin.

entries.name: Helsquid

traits.name: Shadow Ink
traits.effect: Blinds enemies for 1 turn.

traits.name: Tentacle Crush
traits.effect: Deals massive damage and immobilizes target.

entries.description: Shadowy abyssal squids tied to Helheim, summoned by Helya’s cultists during Legion.

entries.name: Jellyfish

traits.name: Stinging Tentacles
traits.effect: On contact, target is Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Drift
traits.effect: Moves silently with currents; hard to detect.

entries.description: Bioluminescent creatures drifting in the oceans of Azeroth. Beautiful but deadly when touched.

entries.name: Basilisk

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.effect: On high roll, target is Stunned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Stone Scales
traits.effect: Reduces incoming physical damage by 2.

entries.description: Stone-skinned lizards with a deadly gaze, found in deserts and ruins across Azeroth and Outland.

entries.name: Crocolisk

traits.name: Death Roll
traits.effect: On grapple, inflicts extra damage each turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.effect: Can fight equally well in water or on land.

entries.description: Savage reptilian predators inhabiting swamps, rivers, and jungles of Azeroth.

entries.name: Snake

traits.name: Venom Bite
traits.effect: Inflicts Poisoned (2 turns).

traits.name: Slither
traits.effect: Can move through small spaces freely.

entries.description: Common serpents of Azeroth’s forests, deserts, and caves. Many are venomous and feared by villagers.

entries.name: Sea Serpent

traits.name: Tidal Coil
traits.effect: Pulls prey underwater, immobilizing them.

traits.name: Scaled Bulk
traits.effect: First hit each round reduced by 2.

entries.description: Colossal serpents dwelling in Azeroth’s oceans, sometimes mistaken for proto-dragons.

entries.name: Arcane Wyrm

traits.name: Arcane Bite
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Arcane Burn (-1 for 2 turns).

traits.name: Ley Sense
traits.effect: Detects ley lines and arcane sources nearby.

entries.description: Lesser dragon-like serpents infused with arcane energy, often kept as pets or guardians by magi.

entries.name: Mana Wyrm

traits.name: Arcane Pulse
traits.effect: On hit, disrupts caster’s spell next turn.

traits.name: Magical Affinity
traits.effect: Takes half damage from arcane sources.

entries.description: Small, snake-like arcane constructs often found around Silvermoon City and Sunstrider Isle.

entries.name: Wind Serpent

traits.name: Lightning Breath
traits.effect: Inflicts Shocked (no reactions) for 1 turn.

traits.name: Soaring Glide
traits.effect: Ignores terrain penalties while airborne.

entries.description: Agile flying reptiles worshiped by trolls as emissaries of the storm.

entries.name: Turtle

traits.name: Shell Shield
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2.

traits.name: Withdraw
traits.effect: May avoid all damage for one round, but cannot attack.

entries.description: Turtles of all sizes inhabit Azeroth’s lakes and beaches, serving as mounts and companions.

entries.name: Dragon Turtle

traits.name: Steam Breath
traits.effect: Inflicts Burning for 2 turns.

traits.name: Stalwart
traits.effect: Immune to forced movement.

entries.description: Massive armored turtles of Pandaria, revered by the Pandaren and used as mounts.

entries.name: Fire Turtle

traits.name: Molten Shell
traits.effect: Inflicts 1 Burning damage to melee attackers.

traits.name: Lava Spit
traits.effect: Deals fire damage at range once per encounter.

entries.description: Volcanic turtle species inhabiting lava fields and Firelands, their shells glow with molten veins.

entries.name: Warp Stalker

traits.name: Phase Step
traits.effect: May teleport short distances once per turn.

traits.name: Warped Hide
traits.effect: Takes half damage from arcane sources.

entries.description: Strange lizard-beasts from Outland capable of phasing between dimensions.

entries.name: Voidstalker

traits.name: Void Phase
traits.effect: On miss, may teleport to another nearby space.

traits.name: Umbral Hide
traits.effect: Takes reduced damage from shadow attacks.

entries.description: Void-corrupted warp stalkers twisted into shadow predators during the Legion’s invasion.

entries.name: Raptor

traits.name: Pack Hunter
traits.effect: Deals +1 damage when near other raptors.

traits.name: Leap Strike
traits.effect: First attack after movement gains advantage.

entries.description: Swift, cunning predators used as mounts and hunting companions by trolls.

entries.name: Ravasaur

traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Ferocious Bite
traits.effect: Critical hits inflict Bleeding for 2 turns.

entries.description: Venomous raptor cousins found in Un’Goro and Feralas, more savage than their kin.

entries.name: Falcosaur

traits.name: Swooping Strike
traits.effect: Can attack immediately after a glide.

traits.name: Keen Vision
traits.effect: Has advantage detecting concealed targets.

entries.description: Feathered raptor-kin introduced in Legion, fiercely loyal when raised from hatchlings.

entries.name: Devilsaur

traits.name: Terrifying Roar
traits.effect: All enemies must test morale or flee.

traits.name: Crushing Jaws
traits.effect: On hit, ignores armor and deals massive damage.

entries.description: Towering apex predators that dominate Un’Goro and Zandalar. Trolls revere them as gods of strength.

entries.name: Direhorn

traits.name: Horn Gore
traits.effect: Deals extra damage on a charge.

traits.name: Armored Hide
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2.

entries.description: Massive horned dinosaurs bred by Zandalari trolls as living siege weapons.

entries.name: Stegodon

traits.name: Tail Swipe
traits.effect: Hits multiple enemies behind it.

traits.name: Thick Scales
traits.effect: Takes half damage from physical attacks.

entries.description: Towering, armored dinosaurs used as beasts of burden and mounts by trolls.

entries.name: Pterrordax

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.effect: First attack after descending deals extra damage.

traits.name: Shriek
traits.effect: Inflicts Fear on weaker foes.

entries.description: Savage winged reptiles nesting in Zandalar and Un’Goro, worshipped as sacred by trolls.

entries.name: Skyscreamer

traits.name: Sonic Screech
traits.effect: On hit, disorients enemies for 1 turn.

traits.name: Dive Slam
traits.effect: Deals bonus damage on dive attack.

entries.description: Variant of pterrordaxes introduced in Pandaria, known for their piercing screams.

entries.name: Brutosaur

traits.name: Massive Stomp
traits.effect: Hits all enemies in range, knocking them prone.

traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 3.

entries.description: Gargantuan sauropods of Zandalar, towering over entire battlefields. Sometimes used as living trade caravans.

entries.name: Ankylodon

traits.name: Tail Club
traits.effect: On hit, target is Staggered for 1 turn.

traits.name: Armor Plates
traits.effect: Takes half damage from piercing attacks.

entries.description: Armored behemoths from Zandalar, their tails can shatter stone with a single swing.

entries.name: Platysaur

traits.name: Swamp Dash
traits.effect: Ignores difficult terrain in marshes.

traits.name: Tail Lash
traits.effect: Deals extra damage to flanking targets.

entries.description: Primitive dinosaur breeds from Pandaria’s swamps, related to raptors and crocolisks.

entries.name: Saurid

traits.name: Tribal Ambush
traits.effect: Gains advantage when attacking from concealment.

traits.name: Savage Claws
traits.effect: Criticals inflict Bleeding for 2 turns.

entries.description: Primitive humanoid-like dinosaur species of Pandaria, often used as shock troops by saurok and trolls.

entries.name: Threshadon

traits.name: Deep Maw
traits.effect: Can swallow smaller targets whole.

traits.name: Crushing Body
traits.effect: Immune to knockback and prone effects.

entries.description: Colossal sea-dinosaurs dwelling in Azeroth’s deepest oceans, mistaken for kraken by sailors.

entries.name: Cloud Serpent

traits.name: Lightning Strike
traits.effect: On critical, inflicts Shocked (cannot react) for 1 turn.

traits.name: Soaring Grace
traits.effect: Ignores terrain penalties while airborne.

entries.description: Elegant serpents of Pandaria revered as companions and mounts, bound through rituals of trust.

entries.name: Dragonhawk

traits.name: Flame Breath
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Burning for 1 turn.

traits.name: Blazing Speed
traits.effect: Can disengage after an attack without provoking.

entries.description: Fiery draconic beasts bred by the blood elves of Quel’Thalas, used as mounts and war companions.

entries.name: Drakeadon

traits.name: Molten Hide
traits.effect: Melee attackers take 1 Burning damage.

traits.name: Seismic Roar
traits.effect: On use, enemies in range must test morale or be Shaken.

entries.description: Obscure draconic beasts tied to Blackrock depths and Outland, often mistaken for lesser drakes.

entries.name: Hydra

traits.name: Triple Bite
traits.effect: Can attack up to 3 adjacent targets per round.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.effect: At start of turn, regains 1 HP unless fire-damaged.

entries.description: Three-headed monstrosities dwelling in swamps and coasts, feared as ancient proto-draconic aberrations.

entries.name: Kodo Beast

traits.name: Stampede
traits.effect: When in groups, they deal damage to all enemies in path.

traits.name: Stalwart Hide
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2.

entries.description: Massive pack lizards of Kalimdor, revered by tauren and orcs as beasts of burden and war mounts.

entries.name: Mushan Beast

traits.name: Horn Charge
traits.effect: On hit after movement, target is Knocked Back.

traits.name: Iron Stomach
traits.effect: Immune to poison effects.

entries.description: Large reptilian beasts of Pandaria used as both mounts and sources of meat and leather.

entries.name: Saurolisk

traits.name: Venom Spit
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Slither Step
traits.effect: Can move through swamp terrain without penalty.

entries.description: Acid-spitting lizards of Nazmir and Zuldazar, their scales shimmer with swamp toxins.

entries.name: Sabertusk

traits.name: Ambush Lunge
traits.effect: First strike from stealth has advantage.

traits.name: Shredding Jaws
traits.effect: On critical, inflicts Bleeding for 2 turns.

entries.description: Massive desert lizards of Vol’dun with saber-like tusks and a savage bite.

entries.name: Thunder Lizard

traits.name: Lightning Breath
traits.effect: Deals bonus nature damage to multiple foes.

traits.name: Thunderous Stomp
traits.effect: All enemies nearby must test morale or be Staggered.

entries.description: Ancient, magical lizards of Kalimdor capable of channeling lightning through their horns.

entries.name: Shardhide

traits.name: Crystalline Plates
traits.effect: Reduces incoming physical damage by 3.

traits.name: Shatter Stomp
traits.effect: On critical, fragments strike nearby enemies.

entries.description: Crystalline lizard-beasts of Maldraxxus, hardened by necrotic magic and anima-infused stone.

entries.name: Jormungar

traits.name: Burrow
traits.effect: Can disappear underground and reappear elsewhere.

traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Poisoned for 2 turns.

entries.description: Colossal worms from Northrend, tunneling through ice and stone. Revered and feared by the Nerubians and Tuskarr.

entries.name: Lava Worm

traits.name: Molten Bite
traits.effect: Inflicts Burning for 2 turns.

traits.name: Lava Surge
traits.effect: On hit, terrain becomes hazardous (fire damage next round).

entries.description: Magma-dwelling worms inhabiting the Firelands and volcanic caverns. They radiate heat even when dormant.

entries.name: Rockworm

traits.name: Stone Maw
traits.effect: Ignores armor on hit.

traits.name: Tunnel Collapse
traits.effect: May destabilize ground, reducing movement speed of enemies nearby.

entries.description: Massive worms of Gorgrond that chew through stone and wood, reshaping terrain as they burrow.

entries.name: Sandworm

traits.name: Swallow Whole
traits.effect: On hit, small enemies are incapacitated for 1 round.

traits.name: Sandstorm
traits.effect: Kicks up a sandstorm, imposing disadvantage on enemies.

entries.description: Classic titanic worms that haunt deserts like Silithus and Tanaris, feared by travelers for ambushes beneath the dunes.

entries.name: Carrion Worm

traits.name: Corpse Eater
traits.effect: Heals 1 HP when an enemy dies nearby.

traits.name: Rotting Maw
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Weakened (-1) for 2 turns.

entries.description: Worms feeding on corpses in battlefields, spreading disease and rot as they burrow through remains.

entries.name: Bone Worm

traits.name: Skeletal Hide
traits.effect: Takes half damage from physical attacks.

traits.name: Gnawing Hunger
traits.effect: On hit, drains 1 morale from target.

entries.description: Undead worm-beasts animated by necrotic energies, leaving trails of gnawed bones in their wake.

entries.name: Tidal Guardian

traits.name: Crushing Coil
traits.effect: On hit, immobilizes target for 1 turn.

traits.name: Abyssal Pressure
traits.effect: Enemies nearby lose 1 morale at start of round.

entries.description: Enormous deep-sea worms serving as guardians of Nazjatar’s abyss, commanded by naga spellcasters.

entries.name: Chimaera

traits.name: Twin Breath
traits.effect: Breathes frost and lightning simultaneously.

traits.name: Wing Buffet
traits.effect: Knocks back all adjacent enemies.

entries.description: Two-headed winged predators from Azeroth’s wilds, feared for their elemental breath.

entries.name: Core Hound

traits.name: Magma Breath
traits.effect: Inflicts Burning for 2 turns.

traits.name: Molten Hide
traits.effect: Melee attackers take 1 Burning damage.

entries.description: Two-headed infernal hounds of the Firelands, servants of Ragnaros and his lieutenants.

entries.name: Fel Beast

traits.name: Fel Claw
traits.effect: On hit, target takes Burning for 1 turn.

traits.name: Infernal Hunger
traits.effect: Restores 1 HP when striking a living creature.

entries.description: Mutated hounds bred from fel energies, unleashed during the Burning Legion’s crusades.

entries.name: Flayedwing

traits.name: Rotting Bite
traits.effect: Inflicts Disease for 2 turns.

traits.name: Gore Dive
traits.effect: On hit, knocks target prone.

entries.description: Grotesque winged carrion beasts of the Shadowlands, stripped of flesh but still alive with hunger.

entries.name: Rylak

traits.name: Icy Breath
traits.effect: Inflicts Frost damage and slows target.

traits.name: Dive Slam
traits.effect: Deals heavy damage when striking from above.

entries.description: Wyvern-like flying reptiles of Draenor, often harnessed by the Iron Horde.

entries.name: Mana Ray

traits.name: Arcane Drain
traits.effect: Reduces target’s spell power for 1 turn.

traits.name: Glide
traits.effect: Ignores terrain while moving.

entries.description: Graceful flying rays of Argus, infused with raw arcane energy.

entries.name: Panthara

traits.name: Prowl
traits.effect: First strike from stealth has advantage.

traits.name: Arcane Pelt
traits.effect: Reduces arcane damage taken by 2.

entries.description: Arcane-infused predators from Argus, feline in appearance with crystalline pelts.

entries.name: Seeker

traits.name: Void Gaze
traits.effect: On hit, target is Weakened (-1) for 2 turns.

traits.name: Ethereal Flight
traits.effect: Can phase through obstacles once per encounter.

entries.description: Void-touched flying horrors encountered on Argus, minions of the Shadowguard.

entries.name: Shadow Serpent

traits.name: Shadow Breath
traits.effect: Inflicts Fear for 1 turn.

traits.name: Umbral Coil
traits.effect: Immobilizes target briefly.

entries.description: Serpentine void creatures slithering in Legion’s corrupted realms.

entries.name: Soul Eater

traits.name: Devour Soul
traits.effect: On kill, heals 3 HP and gains +1 morale.

traits.name: Abyssal Presence
traits.effect: All enemies nearby lose 1 morale at round start.

entries.description: Shadowlands predators feeding on anima and mortal souls, feared across the Maw.

entries.name: Necroray

traits.name: Necrotic Spines
traits.effect: Inflicts Disease for 1 turn.

traits.name: Carrion Glide
traits.effect: Moves silently above battlefield.

entries.description: Rotting ray-beasts of Maldraxxus, corrupted by necrotic magic and used as war mounts.

entries.name: Spirit Beast

traits.name: Spectral Strike
traits.effect: Ignores armor on hit.

traits.name: Spirit Mend
traits.effect: Heals an ally 3 HP once per encounter.

entries.description: Ethereal spectral beasts, rarest companions of hunters, drawn from primal spirits of Azeroth.

entries.name: Quilen

traits.name: Stone Hide
traits.effect: Takes half damage from physical attacks.

traits.name: Guardian’s Roar
traits.effect: Nearby allies gain +1 morale.

entries.description: Stone lion-dogs of Pandaria, guardians of mogu temples and monuments.

entries.name: Gargon

traits.name: Fanged Maul
traits.effect: On critical, target is Knocked Back.

traits.name: Anima Infusion
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage by 2 this round.

entries.description: Massive stone-skinned war beasts of Revendreth, bred as mounts by the Venthyr.

entries.name: Sporebat

traits.name: Spore Cloud
traits.effect: Inflicts Weakened (-1) for 2 turns.

traits.name: Glide
traits.effect: Ignores terrain penalties.

entries.description: Floating mushroom-like beasts of Zangarmarsh, glowing with bioluminescence and strange spores.

entries.name: Spore Walker

traits.name: Fungal Lash
traits.effect: On hit, inflicts Poisoned for 1 turn.

traits.name: Toxic Trail
traits.effect: Leaves behind spores that reduce enemy morale.

entries.description: Fungoid quadrupeds found in Outland and Shadowlands, spreading spores as they roam.

entries.name: Wilderling

traits.name: Wild Bond
traits.effect: Nearby allies gain +1 morale at round start.

traits.name: Fey Step
traits.effect: Can teleport a short distance once per encounter.

entries.description: Mystical beasts of Ardenweald, bound to the cycle of rebirth and the Night Fae.
